  --> contracts/HedgingManager.sol:54:9:
   |
54 |         uint256 xrpPrice = ftso.getCurrentPrice("XRP");
   |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

documentation.text:
FTSOConsumer
 - Connects to Flare Time Series Oracle (FTSO)
 - Provides secure price feeds for assets (BTC, XRP, etc.)
 - Backend can call this contract to fetch latest prices
Register a new FTSO price provider for an asset
Get the current price of an asset from its FTSO provider

HedgingManager
 - Connects to FTSO price feeds
 - Allows Smart Accounts to trigger hedging
 - Executes swaps (via DEX integration)
Deposit BTC position (simulated as ERC20)
Deposit XRP position (simulated as ERC20)
Hedge BTC losses with XRP
View positions

SmartAccount
 - Manages collateral deposits and withdrawals
 - Handles settlement of trades and hedges
 - Integrates with HedgingManager for automated hedging
 - Supports multiple ERC20 tokens
@notice Update the HedgingManager address
